tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SecurityScans (
    scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_name VARCHAR(50),
    scan_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    vulnerabilities_found INT,
    scan_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_recommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_id UUID,
    recommendation TEXT,
    recommendation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES vulnerability_scans(scan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_scans (
  scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scan_name TEXT,
  scan_date TIMESTAMP,
  vulnerabilities_found INT
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
  vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vulnerability_name TEXT,
  vulnerability_description TEXT,
  vulnerability_severity INT,
  scan_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES security_scans(scan_id)
)

CREATE TABLE scan_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scan_id INT,
  vulnerability_id INT,
  result_description TEXT,
  result_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES security_scans(scan_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id)
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(100),
    risk_level VARCHAR(20),
    exploitability VARCHAR(20),
    remediation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE scan_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_id INT,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    result_status VARCHAR(20),
    result_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES vulnerability_scans(scan_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id)
);

CREATE TABLE findings (
    finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    finding_name VARCHAR(100),
    vulnerability_id INT,
    scan_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES scans(scan_id)
);
